mapper.select: select tr.role_id, tr.role_name, tr.create_date, tr.modify_date from db_dimples_shiro.tb_role_user tru join db_dimples_shiro.tb_role tr on tru.role_id = tr.role_id where tru.user_id = 4;

SELECT r.role_id, role_name, r.create_date, r.modify_date FROM tb_role r LEFT JOIN tb_role_user ru ON (r.role_id = ru.role_id) LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON (u.user_id = ru.user_id) WHERE u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
